IF YOU CAN'T RUN THE RUN_P2.EXE FOLLOW THESE INSTUCTIONS!

1: Install the game as they say.
2: Go to your steam game folder (C:/program files/steam/steamapps/common/)
3: Copie the files from portal2 TO the 'Common' folder
4: CLOSE STEAM!
5: Run 'Run_P2.exe'

IF PORTAL IS IN RUSSION! 

1: Open Portal2 folder.
2: Open 'Rev' file.
3: change eveything to: 


[Loader]

ProcName=portal2.exe

[Emulator]

#Language = English
Language = English
SteamDll=bin\Steam_RevCrew.dll
SteamClient = True
SteamUser = SteamPlayer

[steamclient]

PlayerName="YOURNAME"

4: Save it!
------------------------------
Now it should work properly, and have fun!

INSTRUCTIONS- 
1. Download and install â€œSteamâ€.  (Google it)
2. Make a Steam account and sign in.  It should automatically download components that you need. 
3. Download the Portal 2 torrent file.  Once it completes run the installer- "P2_full_client_190411[csmania.ru]"

4. To install. (super spoon-feeding mode) When you run the executable file an installation screen will pop up, but it will be in Russian.  
     On the first page- click the button that points to the right >
     On the second page- select the top circle (as if you were agreeing to terms and conditions, but you didnâ€™t read them) then click the button pointing to the right >
     On the third page- you choose the folder Portal 2 will be installed in.  You can install it in the destination- C:/program files/steam/steamapps/common/ (Copy-Paste will work) or you can move the files there later, which can take a long time. 
     On the fourth page- just check the box and click next. (IDK what the box is)
     For the fifth page- uncheck the box (IDK what this one is either) and select the â€œEnglishâ€ language.  Click next.  Then click the â€œinstallâ€ button located where the next button usually is.  
Wait for it to installâ€¦. Once itâ€™s finished click the last button to finish.  

5. If you havenâ€™t already placed the files in Steamâ€™s programs files go ahead and do this now. Copy the contents of the Portal 2 folder and paste it into- C:\Program Files\steam\steamapps\Common (you may need to create the â€˜commonâ€™ folder)

6. To get it in full English- move the â€˜revâ€™ file to the desktop (so that it will not block you from editing the file).  Open it with notepad, and replace everything in it with this---

[Loader]

ProcName=portal2.exe

[Emulator]

#Language = English
Language = English
SteamDll=bin\Steam_RevCrew.dll
SteamClient = True
SteamUser = SteamPlayer

[steamclient]

PlayerName="CSmania.RU"

7. Save the file.  
8. To finally play Portal 2- go to â€œC:\Program Files\steam\steamapps\Commonâ€ and run the file â€œRUN_P2â€ or â€œPortal2â€
9. Enjoy!

INSTRUCTIONS- 
1. Download and install "Steam"Â. (Google it)
2. Make a Steam account and sign in. It should automatically download components that you need. 
3. Download the Portal 2 torrent file. Once it completes run the installer- "P2_full_client_190411[csmania.ru]"

4. To install. (super spoon-feeding mode) When you run the executable file an installation screen will pop up, but it will be in Russian. 
On the first page- click the button that points to the right >
On the second page- select the top circle (as if you were agreeing to terms and conditions, but you didn't read them) then click the button pointing to the right >
On the third page- you choose the folder Portal 2 will be installed in. You can install it in the destination- C:/program files/steam/steamapps/common/ (Copy-Paste will work) or you can move the files there later, which can take a long time. 
On the fourth page- just check the box and click next. (IDK what the box is)
For the fifth page- uncheck the box (IDK what this one is either) and select the 'English'Â language. Click next. Then click the 'install' button located where the next button usually is. 
Wait for it to install. Once it's finished click the last button to finish. 

5. If you haven't already placed the files in Steam's programs files go ahead and do this now. Copy the contents of the Portal 2 folder and paste it into- C:\Program Files\steam\steamapps\Common (you may need to create the 'common' folder)

6. To get it in full English- move the 'rev' file to the desktop (so that it will not block you from editing the file). Open it with notepad, and replace everything in it with this---

[Loader]

ProcName=portal2.exe

[Emulator]

#Language = English
Language = English
SteamDll=bin\Steam_RevCrew.dll
SteamClient = True
SteamUser = SteamPlayer

[steamclient]

PlayerName="CSmania.RU"

7. Save the file. 
8. To finally play Portal 2- go to "C:\Program Files\steam\steamapps\Common"Â and run the file 'RUN_P2'Â or 'Portal2'
9. Enjoy!

"STEAM validation rejected"...
i see lot of people have the same issue. please help.( closing steam didn't help.)

@FluuxPav
how to fix "STEAM validation rejected"

1. Start the task manger (ctrl+alt+delete)
2. Go to the 'processes' tab.  
3. Find the process 'steam' or something similar.  
4. End the process. 

5. ENJOY PORTAL 2!!!! ^_^

Night:

Those updates, I'm supposed to copy and paste // replace the original files with those updates, right?  Because the black screen didn't fix.

@Shuriken-Jutsu,
Sure. If black screen exists even now, then.. okay, try to install crack-fix from Skidrow:
narod[.]ru / disk / 10684883001 / Portal.2.CrackFIX-SKIDROW.rar.html

OR this one:
narod[.]ru / disk / 10987409001 / Portal.2.Update.2-SKIDROW.rar.html
Works a treat, thanks for the upload!

@Shuriken-Jutsu
Make sure you installed them in right order. You remember: game, patch #1, patch #2.
95% people have their games fixed after these steps. Sorry, I don't know any other fixes or patches from authoritative sources.

Oh, also try to reinstall directx and then video-driver.

It turns out that Portal only supports Intel HD2000 and HD3000 videochips. Every other Intel videochip has been reported as not working correctly or not working at all.  T__T
